about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Vehicles stopped behind a school bus with its red lights flashing must remain stopped until:

about.name: Vehicles stopped behind a school bus with its red lights flashing must remain stopped until:

hasPart.assesses: Vehicles stopped behind a school bus with its red lights flashing must remain stopped until: | Vehicles stopped behind a school bus with its red lights flashing must remain stopped until: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When a school bus is flashing its red lights and has its stop arm extended, motorists must come to a full stop until the lights are turned off, the stop arm is withdrawn, and the bus begins moving again.

suggestedAnswer.text: All students are off the bus.

comment.text: All students are off the bus.
The stop arm is retracted.

suggestedAnswer.text: The stop arm is retracted and the bus resumes motion.

comment.text: The stop arm is retracted and the bus resumes motion.

acceptedAnswer.text: The stop arm is retracted and the bus resumes motion.

comment.text: The stop arm is retracted and the bus resumes motion.

answerExplanation.text: When a school bus is flashing its red lights and has its stop arm extended, motorists must come to a full stop until the lights are turned off, the stop arm is withdrawn, and the bus begins moving again.

comment.text: Vehicles stopped behind a school bus with its red lights flashing must remain stopped until: | When a school bus is flashing its red lights and has its stop arm extended, motorists must come to a full stop until the lights are turned off, the stop arm is withdrawn, and the bus begins moving again.

hasPart.name: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in:

You are driving in: | You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Freeway lanes that are ending will usually be marked by large broken lines painted on the pavement. If you are driving in a lane marked with these broken lines, be prepared to exit the freeway or for the lane to end.

suggestedAnswer.text: The carpool lane and must merge into the next lane.

comment.text: The carpool lane and must merge into the next lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: A special lane for slow-moving vehicles.

comment.text: A special lane for slow-moving vehicles.
An exit lane.
An exit lane.

answerExplanation.text: Freeway lanes that are ending will usually be marked by large broken lines painted on the pavement. If you are driving in a lane marked with these broken lines, be prepared to exit the freeway or for the lane to end.

comment.text: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. hasPart.name: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means:

about.name: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means:

hasPart.assesses: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: | You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop before entering the intersection, as long as you can do so safely.

comment.text: Stop before entering the intersection, as long as you can do so safely.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing the intersection.

comment.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.

comment.text: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: | A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.

hasPart.name: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely:

about.name: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely:

hasPart.assesses: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: | If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

comment.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.
Improve traffic flow.
Demonstrate defensive driving techniques.

acceptedAnswer.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

comment.text: Interfere with traffic and receive a ticket.

answerExplanation.text: You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

comment.text: If you drive more slowly than the flow of traffic, you will most likely: | You must drive more slowly than usual when there is heavy traffic or bad weather. However, if you block the normal and reasonable movement of traffic by driving too slowly, you may be cited. You should match the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

hasPart.text: A yellow sign with a traffic signal pictured indicates that there is a traffic signal is ahead. Be prepared to respond to the upcoming traffic signal.

comment.text: Controlled railroad ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Be prepared to stop if the light is flashing.

comment.text: Be prepared to stop if the light is flashing.

suggestedAnswer.text: There is a traffic signal ahead.

comment.text: There is a traffic signal ahead.

hasPart.name: You may drive a motor vehicle in a bike lane:

about.name: You may drive a motor vehicle in a bike lane:

hasPart.assesses: You may drive a motor vehicle in a bike lane: | You may drive a motor vehicle in a bike lane: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If making a right turn, you may enter the bicycle lane no more than 200 feet before the corner or driveway. Drivers of motor vehicles should not enter a bicycle lane at any other time.

suggestedAnswer.text: If you drive more slowly than 15 mph.

comment.text: If you drive more slowly than 15 mph.

suggestedAnswer.text: No more than 200 feet before making a right turn.

comment.text: No more than 200 feet before making a right turn.
Whenever bicyclists are not present.

acceptedAnswer.text: No more than 200 feet before making a right turn.

comment.text: No more than 200 feet before making a right turn.

answerExplanation.text: If making a right turn, you may enter the bicycle lane no more than 200 feet before the corner or driveway. Drivers of motor vehicles should not enter a bicycle lane at any other time.

comment.text: You may drive a motor vehicle in a bike lane: | If making a right turn, you may enter the bicycle lane no more than 200 feet before the corner or driveway. Drivers of motor vehicles should not enter a bicycle lane at any other time.
